Title: The Cache in the Crag
Description:
<This barrel is salt-encrusted and buried amongst the rubble but remarkably intact.

It looks like the sort of mundane cache that villagers would use to store goods, but no one has lived here for thousands of years. Could there still be something inside?

Roska will want to have a look at this!>
ObjectivesText: Speak to Roska to begin carefully excavating the dragonkin cache.

Objectives.Text: Speak to Roska to start the excavation
